ygData.subject: Re: Enchanter FAQ
ygData.msgSnippet: I suggest bribing another dark elf to buy it for you.... ... From: Daniel Devorkin [mailto:devo@namsko.com] Sent: Tuesday, April 27, 1999 10:08 PM To:
ygData.messageBody:
I suggest bribing another dark elf to buy it for you....

-----Original Message-----
From: Daniel Devorkin [mailto:devo@...]
Sent: Tuesday, April 27, 1999 10:08 PM
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Subject: [eqenchanters] Re: Enchanter FAQ


From: "Daniel Devorkin" <devo@...>

well, its a bit late to be agnostic hehehe
other suggestions? how about casting alliance a few times on some dark
elves????

----- Original Message -----
From: Generic Joe <genericjoe@...>
To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, April 27, 1999 11:13 PM
Subject: [eqenchanters] Re: Enchanter FAQ


> From: "Generic Joe" <genericjoe@...>
>
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: XIII <dlepriol@...>
> To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
> Sent: Tuesday, April 27, 1999 8:14 PM
> Subject: [eqenchanters] Re: Enchanter FAQ
>
>
> > From: XIII <dlepriol@...>
> >
> >
> >
> > Addenda.
> >
> >
> > >Q1.02: How do i get to this library in Neriak alive?
> > >A1.02: To go there make shure to be invis until you are inside
the
> > >library unless you are a darkelf, as the patrolling guards in
commons
> > >sometimes attack humans and erudits, even with illusion: darkelf
casted,
> as
> > >the illusion spell does not seem to hide faction standing. Cast
> illusion:
> > >darkelf when standing before the NPC, but consider first to make
shure
> he
> > >won't attack.
> >
> > A1.02b : Once reaching the vendors, you can actually use minor
illusion.
> > They do accepts lamps as customers.
> >
> > Ibnabeth / Karana
> Also note:
> If you worship a good god, you still might get attacked.
>
> Since enchanters can travel so far, and interact with so many, it is
often
a
> good idea to be an agnostic.
>
> Lysander
>
>
>
